alert.note: Alert for Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 7:54AM CST until December 26 at 7:00PM CST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...The southern Otero County lowlands and mesas as well as much of Hudspeth County out of the Rio Grande valley. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 6 PM MST Sunday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strong west/southwesterly winds could blow around unsecured objects and holiday decorations. Tree limbs could be blown down. Local blowing dust and buffeting winds may make travel hazardous.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Northern Hudspeth Highlands, Hueco Mountains; Salt Basin; Southern Hudspeth Highlands
